message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the opportunity to acquire this valuable product. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll find it beneficial. As such, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a competitive price considering its worth to you, and I'm confident you'll find it a great value.
I'm interested in the product, but I think $1200000 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $1000000, but I'm not sure I can go any lower than that. Can you consider my offer?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand your concerns about the price, but I'm still confident that this product is worth a premium. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my original offer, so I'm counteroffering at $1100000. I believe this is a fair price considering the value it will bring to your business.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $1100000. I'm willing to go up to $1050000, but I think that's as high as I can go. Can you consider my offer?

I understand your position, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway again. However, I'm still not willing to go as low as $1050000. I'm willing to make one more concession and counteroffer at $1075000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering the value this product will bring to your business.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above $1075000. I'm willing to meet you at $1050000, but I think I can do better than that. I'll make a serious offer of $1025000, and I hope we can finalize the deal at this price. Can you consider my offer?

Can you consider my final offer?
